text: Rochambeau or Ro-Sham-Bo may refer to: ==Arts and media== * "Roshambo", a song by The Network * Another name for the game of rock–paper–scissors * A game similar to "sack tapping" played by characters on the animated TV show South Park * An album by Orange County punk band Farside * Ro Sham Bo (album), 1994 album by The Grays == People == * Jean-Baptiste Donatien de Vimeur, comte de Rochambeau (1725–1807), French nobleman and soldier who participated in the American Revolutionary War * Donatien-Marie-Joseph de Vimeur, vicomte de Rochambeau (1755–1813), French soldier, the son of Jean-Baptiste Donatien de Vimeur, comte de Rochambeau == Places == * Cayenne – Rochambeau Airport in South America * Rochambeau Middle School in Connecticut * Lycée Rochambeau, a school located in Bethesda, Maryland * Rochambeau, a building in Washington D.C. designed by Thomas Franklin Schneider ==Vessels== * French ironclad Rochambeau * USS Rochambeau (AP-63), American ship * SS Rochambeau, a French Transatlantic ocean liner
title: Rochambeau
